channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Bixby Voice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Bixby Voice

item.title: CVE-2021-25352|2024-08-03T20:03:05.562Z -- samsung%20mobile -- bixby%20voice
item.description: Using PendingIntent with implicit intent in Bixby Voice prior to version 3.0.52.14 allows attackers to execute privileged action by hijacking and modifying the intent.

item.title: CVE-2021-25398|2024-08-03T20:03:05.592Z -- samsung%20mobile -- bixby%20voice
item.description: Intent redirection vulnerability in Bixby Voice prior to version 3.1.12 allows attacker to access contacts.
